attr.title: Maou's Crucible
attr.desc: Maou's Crucible is a community-driven horde survivor roguelite featuring original characters from various creators. Enter the Crucible, survive against hordes of enemies, and claim the title of Demon Lord!
attr.inst: Add the game into your Steam library and dowload the compatible version by placing this command in the Steam console: download_depot 4087610 4087611 2326539360906943302, and copy these files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Add the game into your [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/4087610/Maous_Crucible) library and dowload the compatible version by placing this command in the [Steam console](steam://open/console): `4087610 4087611 2326539360906943302`, and copy these files into the `assets` folder.
